sentence.Network_en: A mackerel sky and mares'tails make lofty ships carry low sails.
sentence.Network_cn: 鱼鳞天,马尾云,大船降帆莫航行.

sentence.Network_en: Mares are surprisingly tolerant of the roughness and rudeness of their own offspring.
sentence.Network_cn: 母马容忍后代粗暴和野蛮的程度教人意外.

sentence.Network_en: Even the mares, Kara and Shiva, revived when they approached Warsaw.
sentence.Network_cn: 连那两匹牝马卡拉和歇伐来到华沙也精神抖擞起来.

entry.def: A mare is an adult female horse.
